EmailTemplate.name: CBFS Rust-Oleum Intro (No Customer Contact)
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot features “If There’s a Surface, There’s a Rust-Oleum”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Sorry I missed you today. I wanted to share that Office Depot now carries Rust-Oleum, to provide you with innovative products that helps maintain and protect surfaces!
Featured Products:
Anti-Slip Tape and Paint Solutions
Write-On Paints and Testor Spray Chalk
Industrial Inverted Marking & Striping Paint
LeakSeal rubber Coatings & Silicone Tape
InstaPatch and Putty patch concrete and surface repair
I have attached our catalog to provide you with the power to transform your surfaces and substrates.
If you have any questions feel free to reach out!
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
{!User.Email}
(855)DEPOT11 ext. {!User.ISO_Extension__c}
https://business.officedepot.com
Customer Service: (888) 263-3423
